{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15010v1", "title": "The Schouten-Nijenhuis bracket in infinite dimensions", "summary": "The Schouten-Nijenhuis bracket on smooth infinite-dimensional manifolds $M$
is developed in two steps: For summable multivector fields whose pointwise dual
are all differential form, and in an extended form for multivector fields which
are sections of $L^{\bullet}_{\text{skew}}(T^*M,\mathbb R)$. We need to either
assume that $C^{\infty}(M)$ separates points on $TM$, or consider sheaves of
local sections.", "main_category": "math.DG", "categories": "math.DG,math.FA", "published": "2025-04-21T10:23:40Z"}
